name: Chronia

ski.name: VOID SHAKER
desc: Chronia uses her powers to shake spacetime in the target area to deal Magical Damage and cause Movement Slow after 0.3s. Enemy units hit again by this ability within 3s will take additional Magical Damage and be affected by Stun for 1s.
study: Deal AOE magical damage and slow enemy units

ski.name: GLITTERING EDGE
desc: Chronia activates Moment in Time to leave a mark at an enemy hero's current location to deal Magical Damage. Target hero will be teleported to marked location after 4s. Ability may also be cast again to immediately teleport hero. Teleport will fail if the target enemy hero leaves a range of 2300.

ski.name: RAPID BAPTISM
desc: Chronia speeds up the flow of surrounding spacetime to decrease the cooldown of all other abilities by 5s. Also increases own Movement Speed and Spell Power for 3s.
study: Decrease own ability's cooldown and increase Spell Power.

ski.name: UNDYING DOMAIN
desc: Cast a protective barrier of time which increases Movement Speed for an allied hero in range for 5s. If this hero dies while covered, deal Magical Damage to nearby enemy units, revive the hero after 3s, and restore a portion of their Health. If the target allied hero does not die while effect is active, the barrier will explode to deal Magical Damage to nearby enemy units and heal the Health of the hero.
study: May revive allied heroes and deal AoE damage
update: Health on Revival â†‘ DMG â†“

story: Chronia was one of the agents responsible for defending time law. She made a mistake, so now she had to do something to make the world better. She set the needle to her first day on the job to redeem herself by saving the future for others.
